content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is entirely in japanese but charted this floppy brimmed hat is crocheted with two strands of different yarn held together **gauge ** no gauge is listed in the pattern **materials ** * japanese size 10/0 6 0 mm hook * approx 85g 139 4 meters pierrot zakka acrylic * approx 40g 140 meters pierrot waku waku motif * buttons 21mm recommended 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/2829/574b pdf
